requirements.title: Notification Bell
requirements.description: Add a notification bell icon to the header with an unread count badge and animation for new notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Notification bell icon is visible in the header
Unread count badge displays up to '99+'
Clicking the bell opens a notification dropdown
Bell animates briefly when a new notification arrives
Positioned on the right side of the header before the user avatar

requirements.title: Notification Dropdown
requirements.description: Provide a dropdown showing recent notifications with navigation and management options.
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown shows a list of the last 20 notifications
Each notification displays an icon, title, timestamp, and read/unread state
'Mark all as read' link is present at the top
'View all' link is present at the bottom
Clicking a notification navigates to the relevant page

requirements.title: Full Notification Page
requirements.description: Create a full notification page with pagination, filtering, bulk actions, and search capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Page displays all notifications with pagination (20 per page)
Users can filter notifications by type and read/unread status
Bulk actions available: mark selected as read, delete selected
Search functionality by keyword is available

requirements.title: Notification Types
requirements.description: Support distinct notification categories with unique icons for each type.
acceptance_criteria: Support for Mentions, Assignments, Updates, Comments, and System notifications
Each type has a distinct icon

requirements.title: Real-time Delivery
requirements.description: Implement real-time notification delivery with WebSocket and fallback mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications appear instantly using WebSocket
Fallback to polling if WebSocket fails
Toast notification for high-priority items
Subtle sound plays for notifications, with user option to disable

requirements.title: Notification Preferences
requirements.description: Allow users to customize notification settings including type toggles, delivery methods, and quiet hours.
acceptance_criteria: Users can toggle each notification type on/off
Users can choose delivery method per type: in-app, email, both, none
Users can set quiet hours for no push notifications
Email digest options: immediate, daily, weekly, never

requirements.title: Mobile Support
requirements.description: Ensure notifications are mobile-friendly with responsive design and touch interactions.
acceptance_criteria: Responsive dropdown design for mobile
Touch-friendly tap targets
Swipe to dismiss notifications on mobile

summary: Develop a centralized notification system with real-time updates, customizable preferences, and mobile support to enhance user engagement and reduce email dependency.
